argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | clatlubcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | clatlubcl.u | |- U = ( lub ` K ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( glb ` K ) = ( glb ` K ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_clatlem | |- ( ( K e. CLat /\ S C_ B ) -> ( ( U ` S ) e. B /\ ( ( glb ` K ) ` S ) e. B ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simpld | |- ( ( K e. CLat /\ S C_ B ) -> ( U ` S ) e. B ) |
